sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM YE165020 AA WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO YE165020 ( DPOB_CD /* 사업장코드 */ ,YRTX_BLGG_YR /* 귀속연도 */ ,CLUT_SEPT_CD /* 연말정산구분코드 */ ,SYSTEMKEY /* SYSTEMKEY */ ,FAM_RLT_CL_CD /* 기부자관계구분코드 */ ,AMT_SUM /* 기부금총합계 */ ,AMT10 /* 기부금_법정기부금_10 */ ,AMT20 /* 기부금_정치자금기부금_20 */ ,AMT40 /* 기부금_종교단체외지정기부금_40 */ ,AMT41 /* 기부금_종교단체지정기부금_41 */ ,AMT42 /* 기부금_우리사주조합기부금_42 */ ,DNT_SBDY_APLN_AMT ,AMT50 /* 기부금_공제제외기부금_50 */ ,KYBDR /* 입력자 */ ,INPT_DT /* 입력일자 */ ,INPT_ADDR /* 입력주소 */ ,ISMT /* 수정자 */ ,REVN_DT /* 수정일자 */ ,REVN_ADDR /* 수정주소 */ ) ( SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , CNBT_RLT_CHG_CD , (AMT10_DDC + AMT20_DDC + AMT40_DDC + AMT41_DDC + AMT42_DDC + (AMT10_CONB + AMT40_CONB + AMT41_CONB) + AMT50_DDC) AMT_SUM , AMT10_DDC AS AMT10 , AMT20_DDC AS AMT20 , AMT40_DDC AS AMT40 , AMT41_DDC AS AMT41 , AMT42_DDC AS AMT42 , (AMT10_CONB + AMT40_CONB + AMT41_CONB) AS AMT_CONB , AMT50_DDC AS AMT50 , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , ('0') AS CNBT_RLT_CHG_CD , MAX(DECODE(CONB_CHG_CD,'10',DDC_TRGT_CONB_AMT,0)) AS AMT10_DDC , MAX(DECODE(CONB_CHG_CD,'10',CONB_SUM_AMT,0)) AS AMT10_CONB , MAX(DECODE(CONB_CHG_CD,'10',CNBT_ETC,0)) AS AMT10_ETC , MAX(DECODE(CONB_CHG_CD,'20',DDC_TRGT_CONB_AMT,0)) AS AMT20_DDC , MAX(DECODE(CONB_CHG_CD,'20',CONB_SUM_AMT,0)) AS AMT20_CONB , MAX(DECODE(CONB_CHG_CD,'20',CNBT_ETC,0)) AS AMT20_ETC , MAX(DECODE(CONB_CHG_CD,'40',DDC_TRGT_CONB_AMT,0)) AS AMT40_DDC , MAX(DECODE(CONB_CHG_CD,'40',CONB_SUM_AMT,0)) AS AMT40_CONB , MAX(DECODE(CONB_CHG_CD,'40',CNBT_ETC,0)) AS AMT40_ETC , MAX(DECODE(CONB_CHG_CD,'41',DDC_TRGT_CONB_AMT,0)) AS AMT41_DDC , MAX(DECODE(CONB_CHG_CD,'41',CONB_SUM_AMT,0)) AS AMT41_CONB , MAX(DECODE(CONB_CHG_CD,'41',CNBT_ETC,0)) AS AMT41_ETC , MAX(DECODE(CONB_CHG_CD,'42',DDC_TRGT_CONB_AMT,0)) AS AMT42_DDC , MAX(DECODE(CONB_CHG_CD,'42',CONB_SUM_AMT,0)) AS AMT42_CONB , MAX(DECODE(CONB_CHG_CD,'42',CNBT_ETC,0)) AS AMT42_ETC , MAX(DECODE(CONB_CHG_CD,'50',DDC_TRGT_CONB_AMT,0)) AS AMT50_DDC , MAX(DECODE(CONB_CHG_CD,'50',CONB_SUM_AMT,0)) AS AMT50_CONB , MAX(DECODE(CONB_CHG_CD,'50',CNBT_ETC,0)) AS AMT50_ETC FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , CONB_CHG_CD , SUM(DDC_TRGT_CONB_AMT) AS DDC_TRGT_CONB_AMT , SUM(CONB_SUM_AMT) AS CONB_SUM_AMT , SUM(CNBT_ETC) AS CNBT_ETC FROM YE165010 AC02 WHERE AC02.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND AC02.YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND AC02.CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND AC02.SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# GROUP BY DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , CONB_CHG_CD ) GROUP BY DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY UNION ALL SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , CNBT_RLT_CHG_CD , MAX(DECODE(CONB_CHG_CD,'10',DDC_TRGT_CONB_AMT,0)) AS AMT10_DDC , MAX(DECODE(CONB_CHG_CD,'10',CONB_SUM_AMT,0)) AS AMT10_CONB , MAX(DECODE(CONB_CHG_CD,'10',CNBT_ETC,0)) AS AMT10_ETC , MAX(DECODE(CONB_CHG_CD,'20',DDC_TRGT_CONB_AMT,0)) AS AMT20_DDC , MAX(DECODE(CONB_CHG_CD,'20',CONB_SUM_AMT,0)) AS AMT20_CONB , MAX(DECODE(CONB_CHG_CD,'20',CNBT_ETC,0)) AS AMT20_ETC , MAX(DECODE(CONB_CHG_CD,'40',DDC_TRGT_CONB_AMT,0)) AS AMT40_DDC , MAX(DECODE(CONB_CHG_CD,'40',CONB_SUM_AMT,0)) AS AMT40_CONB , MAX(DECODE(CONB_CHG_CD,'40',CNBT_ETC,0)) AS AMT40_ETC , MAX(DECODE(CONB_CHG_CD,'41',DDC_TRGT_CONB_AMT,0)) AS AMT41_DDC , MAX(DECODE(CONB_CHG_CD,'41',CONB_SUM_AMT,0)) AS AMT41_CONB , MAX(DECODE(CONB_CHG_CD,'41',CNBT_ETC,0)) AS AMT41_ETC , MAX(DECODE(CONB_CHG_CD,'42',DDC_TRGT_CONB_AMT,0)) AS AMT42_DDC , MAX(DECODE(CONB_CHG_CD,'42',CONB_SUM_AMT,0)) AS AMT42_CONB , MAX(DECODE(CONB_CHG_CD,'42',CNBT_ETC,0)) AS AMT42_ETC , MAX(DECODE(CONB_CHG_CD,'50',DDC_TRGT_CONB_AMT,0)) AS AMT50_DDC , MAX(DECODE(CONB_CHG_CD,'50',CONB_SUM_AMT,0)) AS AMT50_CONB , MAX(DECODE(CONB_CHG_CD,'50',CNBT_ETC,0)) AS AMT50_ETC FROM (SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , CNBT_RLT_CHG_CD , CONB_CHG_CD , SUM(DDC_TRGT_CONB_AMT) AS DDC_TRGT_CONB_AMT , SUM(CONB_SUM_AMT) AS CONB_SUM_AMT , SUM(CNBT_ETC) AS CNBT_ETC FROM YE165010 AC02 WHERE AC02.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND AC02.YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND AC02.CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND AC02.SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# GROUP BY DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , CNBT_RLT_CHG_CD ,CONB_CHG_CD ) GROUP BY DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , CNBT_RLT_CHG_CD ) )

INSERT INTO YE165020 ( DPOB_CD /* 사업장코드 */ ,YRTX_BLGG_YR /* 귀속연도 */ ,CLUT_SEPT_CD /* 연말정산구분코드 */ ,SYSTEMKEY /* SYSTEMKEY */ ,FAM_RLT_CL_CD /* 기부자관계구분코드 */ ,AMT_SUM /* 기부금총합계 */ ,AMT10 /* 기부금_법정기부금_10 */ ,AMT20 /* 기부금_정치자금기부금_20 */ ,AMT40 /* 기부금_종교단체외지정기부금_40 */ ,AMT41 /* 기부금_종교단체지정기부금_41 */ ,AMT42 /* 기부금_우리사주조합기부금_42 */ ,DNT_SBDY_APLN_AMT ,AMT50 /* 기부금_공제제외기부금_50 */ ,KYBDR /* 입력자 */ ,INPT_DT /* 입력일자 */ ,INPT_ADDR /* 입력주소 */ ,ISMT /* 수정자 */ ,REVN_DT /* 수정일자 */ ,REVN_ADDR /* 수정주소 */ ) ( SELECT DPOB_CD, YRTX_BLGG_YR, CLUT_SEPT_CD, SYSTEMKEY, FAM_RLT_CL_CD , AMT_SUM, AMT10, AMT20, AMT40, AMT41, AMT42, DNT_SBDY_APLN_AMT, AMT50 , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# FROM YE167430 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
)

INSERT INTO YE165020 ( DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , FAM_RLT_CL_CD , AMT_SUM , AMT10 , AMT20 , AMT40 , AMT41 , AMT42 , AMT50 , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #yrtxBlggYr# , #clutSeptCd# , #systemkey# , #famRltClCd# , #amtSum# , #amt10# , #amt20# , #amt40# , #amt41# , #amt42# , #amt50# , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE YE165020 SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# , CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# , SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# , FAM_RLT_CL_CD=#famRltClCd# , AMT_SUM=#amtSum# , AMT10=#amt10# , AMT20=#amt20# , AMT40=#amt40# , AMT41=#amt41# , AMT42=#amt42# , AMT50=#amt50# , KYBDR=#kybdr# , INPT_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , INPT_ADDR=#inptAddr# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND FAM_RLT_CL_CD=#famRltClCd#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM YE165020 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND FAM_RLT_CL_CD=#famRltClCd#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , FAM_RLT_CL_CD , AMT_SUM , AMT10 , AMT20 , AMT40 , AMT41 , AMT42 , AMT50 , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YE165020 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND FAM_RLT_CL_CD=#famRltClCd#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , FAM_RLT_CL_CD , AMT_SUM , AMT10 , AMT20 , AMT40 , AMT41 , AMT42 , AMT50 , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YE165020 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , YRTX_BLGG_YR DESC , CLUT_SEPT_CD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC , FAM_RLT_CL_CD DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM YE165020 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
